item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by DC :
Enable project-level locationmap to define the location of the project:status file which contains the change notes. Therefore this can even be from a remote location.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add an automated index page that lists all projects in a category. Use projectDetails/category/*.xml to retrieve it.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add an automated project index page that lists all projects grouped by Category. Use projectDetails/category-index.xml to retrieve it.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add an automated index page that lists all projects using a specific language. Use projectDetails/*-lang.xml to retrieve it.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add an automated project index page that lists all projects grouped by language. Use projectDetails/lang-index.xml to retrieve it.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add an automated index page for all projects using a specified programming language. Use projectDetails/*-lang.xml to retrieve it.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add an automated site.xml snippet that provides links to an index page for all languages in use in all projects. XInclude projectDetails/lang_index.siteSnippet.xml in your site.xml file.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add an indexing capability for all known project descriptors.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Use locationmap to expose plugin resources.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add projectDetails page using the DOAP.xml descriptor.
